Details.Textbox24: Zone 7 is a wholesale water agency in the Livermore valley which supplies potable water and flood protection to a population of approximately 235,000 people. It also supplies irrigation (untreated) water to winegrowers and golf courses. Zone 7's production facilities include 2 surface water treatment plants and 10 wells of varying sizes. Zone 7 has a vehicle fleet of 46 cars, van, trucks and other utility vehicles. Zone 7 buys its electricity primarily from PG&E but also has an agreement to buy power from the Power & Water Resources Pooling Authority (PWRPA) at four facilities.
Details.Textbox41: 100 N Canyons Parkway Livermore, California US
Details.Textbox73: Reporting Protocol: General Reporting Protocol 2.1 and associated updates and clarifications
